    Parcel-level non-circular activity tensor

    calcactivity_parcelwise_noncircular.Rd

    Parcel-level non-circular activity tensor

    calcactivity_parcelwise_noncircular(
  data,
  parcelstoexclude_bytarget = NULL,
  exclusion_h5 = NULL,
  orientation = c("nodes_by_conditions", "conditions_by_nodes"),
  fill_value = 0,
  sparse = TRUE,
  mask_format = c("list", "dgCMatrix")
)

    Arguments

    data

    Numeric matrix of parcel activity.

    parcelstoexclude_bytarget

    Optional per-target exclusions.

    exclusion_h5

    Optional HDF5 path containing per-target exclusions.

    orientation

    Matrix orientation.

    fill_value

    Value used for excluded source entries.

    sparse

    If TRUE, build and use sparse/mask-aware source indexing.

    mask_format

    Sparse mask representation when sparse=TRUE.

    Value

    Array with dimensions (target x source x condition).

    Contents

    Developed by Ben Buchsbaum.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
